The movie is really quite bad.  Its only redeeming quality is the beautiful sceenery of the Yukon Territory.  It could be best described as government propaganda.  The upright, rightous mountie takes on a gang of dirty low-life Russians (actually Latvians) and cleans up the little village.

The acting is not just bad it is cheesey.  The story line, you can see comming from a hundred miles away.
